cause.description:
As SHadows Speak is a metal band from Fresno CA and we are trying to make money so we can record 8 tracks. we have 5 written already and 3 recorded via sh*tty methods. please helps us. leave youre info and you will receive a free finshed product.
tanks :)
1. Recordingc costs money.
2. Money is nonexistant.
3. As Shadows Speak PWNS!!!!
cause.mission: Make Money to Record Our Full Album
cause.name: As Shadows Speak Fundraiser
